title: 奥特曼和纳德拉艰难重组后首次联合采访：“我们是天作之合”
description: OpenAI重组后，奥特曼和纳德拉首次同台。
titleZh: 奥特曼和纳德拉艰难重组后首次联合采访：“我们是天作之合”
titleEn: Altman and Nadella, First Joint Interview After Difficult Restructuring: "We're a Match Made in Heaven"
descriptionZh: OpenAI重组后，奥特曼和纳德拉首次同台。
descriptionEn: Altman and Nadella shared the stage for the first time after OpenAI's restructuring. Beyond explaining and discussing the behind-the-scenes of the reorganization, they are betting on the paradigm shift from Apps to Agents and the implementation of Copilot, striving to balance efficiency and public welfare on the path to AGI.

title: 刷抖音、小红书不会让你变笨，但会影响你的AI

titleZh: 刷抖音、小红书不会让你变笨，但会影响你的AI

descriptionZh: 让人工智能成为高效的“垃圾处理器和净化器”，而不是让它被垃圾信息同化。
descriptionEn: Turning AI into an efficient "garbage processor and purifier" rather than letting it be assimilated by junk information.
